ygData.subject: Re: Guild Loot Rules
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yeah, it was a horrid night... everyone dies a TON of times and lost levels... there was also NO loot for the entire night. You are LUCKY you missed Hate
ygData.messageBody:
> You guys (and another guild I believe) beat us up to Hate
> Monday (I hope no BP's dropped <veg>) But it was a good
> night for DoK as we got three members epic items instead
> of going to Hate.

Yeah, it was a horrid night... everyone dies a TON of times and lost
levels... there was also NO loot for the entire night. You are LUCKY
you missed Hate on Monday, Slyde.

Ok, real story... there was only one bard in Hate on Monday (both
sides) and a Bard BP dropped in the other group. Since Onahoo was the
only one up there, he ran over and got it. Also... when DC dropped
the Mae, he had a Seven stringer... once again, it went to Onahoo...

I, also, was not in Hate on Monday... Monday night was a "make up"
night with my wife because I played WAY too much over the weekend.
Last night was also a family night, so I missed that too...

Speaking of last night, I was playing my magician, and saw quite a
few of you guildmates collecting in Freeport. Working on a Paladin
sword? I was going to offer to help, but knew no one, and you were
not online.

Be well,

Gaelthorne
Xegony
